ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Test of ...
ygData.msgSnippet: And yet they continually complain that all players do when they try to run an event is nuke the npc s to see what they drop. They need to change the name to
ygData.messageBody:
And yet they continually complain that all players do when they try to run
an event is nuke the npc's to see what they drop.

They need to change the name to EverDing apparently. They have done some
improving in the are of static quests, but their dynamic events are
universally stupid. Granted a big part of that is because they refuse to
exclude people whose participation is inappropriate and some of those people
insist on taking everything they can grab.

They already have quests that npc's won't give you if you are over a certain
level, this is just a suggestion to extend that to dynamic events in order
to allow them to run dynamic events for people who will more than likely
never reach 50th. Of course I said that once about 30th level, but there
wasn't anyone at 60th then.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4
[mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2000 1:16 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Test of ...


But that would violate The Vision(tm). Abashi has said all alone that
players who devote more time to the game are the ones most entitled to reap
the rewards. Casual gamers be damned.

Galtin of E'ci
